document.full_text: the leader of a militia that helped ivory coast president alassane ouattara defeat rival laurent gbagbo was killed in a gun battle on wednesday after he and his men refused to obey a presidential order to disarm.
document.title: ivory coast insurgent militia leader killed
lines_and_colors: the leader of a militia that helped ivory coast president alassane ouattara defeat rival laurent gbagbo was killed in a gun battle on wednesday after he and his men refused to obey a presidential order to disarm.
